title: SMNTY Book Club: A Beautiful Work in Progress
itunes:title: SMNTY Book Club: A Beautiful Work in Progress
description:
What does an athlete look like? For this month's book club, Anney and Samantha delve into themes around atleticism, stereotypes, health, running, motivation and the power of support with Mirna Valerio's book A Beautiful Work in Progress.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
